notFound.description: It seems the page you were trying to access has been moved, deleted, or never existed in the first place.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to our platform. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: 2. User Accounts
sections.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.title: 3. Intellectual Property
sections.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

sections.title: 4. Termination
sections.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason.

sections.title: 5. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically for changes.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our services.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide. We also collect information automatically when you use our services, including log data and device information.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and protect our services and users.

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy, such as with service providers who assist us in operating our services.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You may access, correct, or delete your personal information by contacting us. You may also opt out of receiving communications from us.
